Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Such a nice place to eat. The burgers are so tasty. If you like a spicy with a character, just try the blue cheese burger. Paul the owner its such a friendly person. Also the prices are good and fair. Ask for the dutch apple pie, you will love it!

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: We visited this restaurant twice already and feel right at home each time. Paul is a perfect host, super nice and his burgers are made individually and with great care. Also really nice for vegetarians or vegans since every burger can contain a vegan patty. We definitely recommend this place! #lovepaul

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Best burgers I've had so far in Amsterdam. The au cheval is my favorite. The meat, egg, onions, and bun are all perfectly cooked. Paul really knows what he's doing. By the way that's Paul cooking your food and taking your order. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: The best burgers in Amsterdam without a doubt. Paul makes all the burgers himself and they taste amazing or what. Plan to come back and try all the burgers he offers

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Best Burgers in Amsterdam - No competition!  Burger cheese selection is incredible, juicy patties along with crispy authentic fries. The owner is a gent and really made us feel welcome.

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text:
We were the only ones in the restaurant which is unfortunate because the service was lovely!
We each had a burger, my companion had the vegan burger and i had the munster ‚Ä¶

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Great Burger and a lot of different local Beers! Must have in Amsterdam

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Best restaurant of Amsterdam West! Friendliest staff in the world, awesome food. Their newest vegetarian feta/spinach burger is a must. We are regulars here and always delighted with the food, service and atmosphere!

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Delicious! Fresh ingredients and very good quality meat. One of the best burgers I had so far. Oh, and fries are very good too!

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Wow! Paul easily has the best burgers in Amsterdam! We had an amazing dinner, i really recommend this place to anyone who wants a truly extraordinary meal.

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Great burger, beer and service. The owner takes personal care of you. I was told to stay away from burgers in Amsterdam. No way. This is the place to go for a great hamburger.

Name: Paul's Burgers
Review Text: Amazing burgers! One of those New Yorkish hole in the walls that are completely undiscovered. Possibly the best burger in Amsterdam. Try it!

Review Text: The best burger I've had in Amsterdam! If you love burgers and if you love cheese, this place is for you üòç
